channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping still not cleared, 22nd July
item.description:
Fly tipping on Circular Way still has not been collected.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Circular Way, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive potholes in school car park, 22nd July
item.description:
There are huge potholes in the school carpark which are not only a trip hard, but are causing damage to the cars. They are very deep. And the localised flooding makes them worse as you cannot see them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Get rid asap, 22nd July
item.description:
Tired of this trash dumped
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockman Rise, Southend, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrowth of hedges onto path, 22nd July
item.description:
The hedges on the corner of the road have become overgrown, and its difficult to squeeze a buggy around the corner on the pavement. There are lots of children using this route for the school, Goals and nursery, and the bush is forcing them to walk very close to the kurb edge or on the road as it is very narrow.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Graham Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Get road please, 22nd July
item.description:
Tired of these bikes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockman Rise, Southend, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge/Freezer on walk way, 22nd July
item.description:
There has been a double fridge/freezer left at the end of the upper level walkway on Wareham Court for 6 months, it is a hazard
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hertford Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Uneven pavement, 22nd July
item.description:
My 69 year old mother has tripped and hurt herself with this uneven pavement caused whilst community fibre was created. It is near 19 staveley close

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coniston Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Not Fixed, 22nd July
item.description:
With reference to report 7908525. Why have you closed this case with "Fixed". It is not Fixed, the rubbish is still there. Plus some more bags have now been dumped. Please explain why you have closed case 7908525.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glendale Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Limited access on footpaths and disused buildings, 22nd July
item.description:
For several years birds have been perching under part of the bridge on Pinkham Way making it unpleasant to walk underneath and there is sludge as well. On the other side on Friern Barnet Road there is a secluded footpath and it is not possible to access the Retail Park from the entrance to Aldi and B&M store. There are disused buildings close to New Southgate station.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pinkham Way, New Southgate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged Kerbstone, 22nd July
item.description:
On Arnsberg Way, Bexleyheath - opposite Bexleyheath Police Station: The Council outlined in green spray paint a kerbstone on the pavement which is loose and is a trip hazard to pedestrians many months ago however no action has been taken to repair or replace it. Please see the attached picture. Could you please chase your contractor to do something about it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arnsberg Way, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light out, 22nd July
item.description:
This is the street light outside the Sanjugo restaurant, at the end of Hugh Street on the crossroads with Cambridge St. It has been out for a few days and this is a dark cul-de-sac which needs light.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Hugh Street, Victoria, London
